data.title: Game Frame: The Art of Pixels by Jeremy Williams — Kickstarter
data.name: Jeremy Williams
data.description: Game Frame is a grid of 256 ultra-bright LED pixels, perfect for showcasing pixel art and old school video game graphics.

data.title: SHRU - The intelligent cat companion by Jason O'Mara — Kickstarter
data.name: Jason O'Mara
data.description: This is not just another cat toy. Shru is a cat companion. It mimics and responds like a living animal.
